title: A new oxime synthesized from Senecio nutans SCh. Bip (chachacoma) reduces calcium influx in the vascular contractile response in rat aorta
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9933-9942
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01058B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Javier Palacios, Daniel Asunción-Alvarez, Diego Aravena, Mario Chiong, Marcelo A. Catalán, Claudio Parra, Fredi Cifuentes, Adrián Paredes
The Sn–I metabolite decreases the contractile response to KCl or phenylephrine (PE) mainly by blocking Ca2+ entry through voltage-gated Ca2+ channel (VGCC).
